bio.name: Alex Rivera
bio.title: Full-Stack Developer
bio.summary: Passionate developer with 3 years of experience building web applications. I love creating tools that make people's lives easier and learning new technologies along the way.

projects.title: Task Manager App
projects.description: A full-stack task management application built with React and Node.js. Features include drag-and-drop organization, team collaboration, and deadline reminders.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather application that displays current conditions and 5-day forecasts using the OpenWeather API.
